name: Olea's Descent (itch)
description:
Deep below the ruins of an overgrown temple lies the last loose thread connecting the lands with the goddess of death. 

Climb down and survive until you find humanity's last hope.

Build your own hero

Use magic or miracles to boost yourself, harm your enemies, or just simply smash their heads in with your trusty axe. Perhaps you prefer the tactical approach? Lay traps for your enemies!

Features

  • Strategic round based combat
  • Build your own Hero with many Skills and Attributes
  • Each time a new way to play with 15 different weapons and armors
  • Procedural generated levels
  • Steam achievements

Ever changing Shrine

The shrine changes with each new character.
